text: Can you give me a hand?
I want to report a bug
There's an issue with your app
I want to book a flight
Book me a hotel in Berlin
I need to reserve a table
Find me a hotel in Rome
Schedule a ride to the airport
I want to check my order
What’s the status of my parcel?
Is my order out for delivery?
I want to change my payment method
There’s a charge I don’t recognize
I want to know about your products
Give me details about your packages
